content: 16 single_crochet in 4 across 20 row gives 4 of height with 4mm hook **measurements ** * these are approximate measurements * baby blanket 36 x 40 crib/lapghan 36 x 54 receiving blanket 40 x 40 toddler blanket 40 x 54 small throw 52 x 64 large throw 60 x 77 twin and double bed blanket sizes are available in the ad-free pdf **additional notes ** -chain-1 at beginning of row does not count as a stitch -you can make this in a single color or in multiple colors i ve written the following pattern with options for 3 colors *see pattern for additional notes *
